name: Baked Ham with Sweet Gravy
author: Todd Berg
summary: Soooo many people have told me they have never had ham gravy. Boy, are they missing out. This is my favorite meal; baked ham with mashed potatoes and ham gravy. I hope you will enjoy it as much as I do.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Place ham in a large roasting pan, cut-side down
Press brown sugar evenly onto ham
Pour apple into roasting pan and cover with a lid or aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven until ham is heated through, about 80 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
Let ham rest for 10 minutes before transferring to a serving plate
Pour remaining pan juices into a saucepan
Combine flour and milk in a jar with a lid; shake until mixture is blended
Bring pan juices to a boil
Slowly whisk flour mixture into the saucepan until gravy is thick, about 5 minutes
